name: dmrirc.long.multiscan.example
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: A multi-scan example script for DMRIRC in longitudinal analysis.

inputs.description: List of subjects for the multiscan analysis. Each subject is separated by a space.
inputs.name: Subject List

inputs.description: Other options for the analysis, as available in the script. These options are unknown due to the script errors.
inputs.name: Other Options

output-files.description: Output files generated by the script, location not specified due to script errors.
output-files.name: Output Files
